body_html:
Looks like only one of the VMs was connected but disabled. I reenabled this VM. Sorry for missing this earlier. for VM-0, I see "Ping response time is too long or timed out." So that one is actually not connected. We can continue the discussion in the issue you filed, if you like.
…
On Tue, Oct 17, 2017 at 2:15 AM, Nayana Thorat ***@***.***> wrote: @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> The vms used for s390x Tensorflow CI are up and running however disconnected by av8ramit. This is probably due to builds are continuously failing for s390x. I could see the two reasons for build failure: first one is it needs Bazel upgrade to 0.6.1 and other one is google/nsync module. I have upgraded Bazel to 0.6.1 on these vms. For google/nsync failure I have raised an issue here <#13777>. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#13638 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHlCOZVHh-0DkFTgOlMKR0tTYetM51kKks5stHAlgaJpZM4P1vQO> .

body:
Looks like only one of the VMs was connected but disabled. I reenabled this
VM. Sorry for missing this earlier.
for VM-0, I see "Ping response time is too long or timed out." So that one
is actually not connected.

We can continue the discussion in the issue you filed, if you like.

On Tue, Oct 17, 2017 at 2:15 AM, Nayana Thorat <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> The vms used for s390x Tensorflow CI
> are up and running however disconnected by av8ramit. This is probably due
> to builds are continuously failing for s390x. I could see the two reasons
> for build failure: first one is it needs Bazel upgrade to 0.6.1 and other
> one is google/nsync module.
> I have upgraded Bazel to 0.6.1 on these vms. For google/nsync failure I
> have raised an issue here
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/13777>.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/13638#issuecomment-337168798>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHlCOZVHh-0DkFTgOlMKR0tTYetM51kKks5stHAlgaJpZM4P1vQO>
> .
